article.title: Mass distribution in the core of MACS J1206: robust modeling from an exceptionally large sample of central multiple images

multiple_choice_question.text: Which color circles in Figure 1 represent multiple images used in the strong lensing model where the tangential magnification is greater than the radial magnification?
According to Figure 2, which cluster shows the greatest number of spectroscopically confirmed multiple images within a projected distance of 200 kpc from the BCG?
What do the magenta lines in Figure 4 represent?
choices: Isocontours of the surface mass density of the diffuse mass component
Isocontours of the 0.5 - 7 keV Chandra X-ray detection

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the χ² function in Formula (1) quantify?
choices: The goodness of fit of a strong lensing model
The magnification of a multiple image
The convergence of the mass distribution
The shear of the mass distribution
